devices.title: Samsung TV's
devices.description:
The TV's will be identified via UPNP and will be added automatically at the start.
Therefore before starting homebridge the first time be sure your Samsung TV's are running and are connected to the local network.

modelName.title: Model name
modelName.description: This value will automatically be set by the plugin.

lastKnownLocation.title: Last known upnp location
lastKnownLocation.description: This value will automatically be updated by the plugin.

lastKnownIp.title: Last known ip address
lastKnownIp.description: This value will automatically be updated by the plugin.

mac.title: The TV's MAC address
mac.description: This value will automatically be updated by the plugin.

usn.title: UPNP identifier
usn.description: This value will automatically be set by the plugin.

remoteControlPort.title: Remote control port
remoteControlPort.description: When not set for models older than 2014 port 55000 will be used and 8002 for newer ones. You can also try 8001 if e.g. turning off the TV doesn't work.

token.title: Pairing token
token.description: When not already paired and the TV was build after 2013 this value will be set at startup after you allowed pairing on your TV.

customInputs.title: Custom inputs
customInputs.description: Key = Input name, value = comma seperated list of keys to send e.g. KEY_4,KEY_2 to go to channel 42

disableUpnpSetters.title: If true, volume for example will be set by sending multiple volume up / down keys
